replies.body: just trying to get views on youtube. dont click link
Nice work on the cosplay, it also helps because your cute =)
Nice work Cosplaying, looks great! Keep it up!

What is than plan for your next cosplay? Are you going to go ahead with the Kalista, or head towards something new?

It may be a little different, but have you thought of pulling off a Pool Party Leona?

Hey! I'm steering towards  Zelda or Star Guardian Janna for a group cosplay for my next convention :) I do hope to do Katarina one day when I'm more comfortable with my body however.

And yes! I have thought about doing PP Leona, if I ever have a beach event to go to I'll probably get stuck into making her :)

Thanks for the comment!

Haha Zelda sounds awesome, SG Janna might be tricky but should be a bit of fun! Well you're out to have fun, and so are the other cosplayers so I wouldnt worry - besides the cosplays are awesome work so far, you could pull Katarina off if you want to!

A pool party event would be wicked! I'd love to try out PP Draven or Lee Sin if that event ever came around. Probably lee, don't think I could grow the mo.

Best of luck to you!
Your camera angles need work, but well done.
uh thanks? why do you think my angles need work lmao

> [{quoted}](name=Gabbu,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=90Thgil5,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-03-17T01:50:40.901+0000)
>
> uh thanks? why do you think my angles need work lmao

Mainly the Nasus one, the angle should have been down so you tower over. He's a demigod, not a peasant. We should not be looking down on him.
matter of opinion tbh, i tend to go for angles that are more flattering and i happen to really love this photo ^_^ thanks though
